channel.title: More clarity in what is an occupation
channel.description:
Was just seeing in a bug report, someone was having an issue with not knowing debauch being an occupy for the purposes of the mastermind's redirect. I do think skills of which occupation immunity should have something in their description to make it clearer to new players, that debauch is actually an occupy.
In fact, I do admit, I don't even know if say things like CW's tornado etc... counts as an occupy for those purposes either. So yeah absolutely could use some better clarity on that.
Credit to splorch for pointing this issue out.
